DOC.brief_summary: This study aim examine health economic impact adopt femtosecond laser technology assist high volume cataract surgery ( FLACS ) within state-funded healthcare system , National Health Service ( NHS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Femtosecond Laser Assisted Cataract Surgery The NHS
DOC.criteria: Patients must reduce visual acuity visual symptom attribute presence cataract one eye examine ophthalmologist else must require cataract surgery clinical ground visual symptom . Patients must willing attend followup 1 month cataract surgery . Patients must sufficiently fluent English informed consent selfcompletion patient report outcome questionnaire . Children age 18 Already enrol another study The principle exclusion criterion relate clinical contraindication FLACS , : Significant corneal opacity Small pupils follow pharmacological dilatation Patients unable lie sufficiently flat position underneath laser machine .
